msbt.message: Hey, you heard? got themselves a real sweet title. Check it out. It's!I know, right? At first I was kinda confused, but then I said it a few times, andit's so rad.

If you're into titles, it's gonna be tough to beat the one that 's got.!THAT'S SO COOL! I wish I'd thought it up first. I'd seriously love it if folks called me that.Leave it to a tourist to show us how it's done, eh? Guess it's time to up our title game, !

You're visiting , right? Check out their title. It's!I have no idea where the idea came from, but I'm super jealous.Think you could pick their brain for me? I gotta know where such a cool title came from, !
